00016 class SaturationConstants;

00025 class SaturationConstants: public LCHcalCalibrationObject2D{
00026 
00027 public:
00028   
00029   SaturationConstants() {};
00030   
00031   SaturationConstants(unsigned chip, unsigned channel, float value, float error) {
00032     unsigned _cellId = (chip << 8) + channel;
00033     setCellKey(_cellId);
00034     obj()->setFloatVal(0, value);
00035   };
00036   
00037   SaturationConstants(LCObject* obj): LCHcalCalibrationObject2D(obj) {};
00038   
00039   virtual ~SaturationConstants() {};
00040 
00043   float getSaturationValue() const {
00044     return getFloatVal(0);
00045   };  
00046 
00049   float getSaturationError() const {  
00050     return 0.;
00051   };
00052   
00055   float applyCalibration(float inputValue, float inputParameter) const {
00056     return (float) (inputValue / (1 - getSaturationValue() * inputParameter));
00057   };
00058   
00061   float cancelCalibration(float outputValue, float inputParameter) const {
00062     return (float) (outputValue * (1 - getSaturationValue() * inputParameter));
00063   };  
00064   
00067   float applyCalibrationError(float inputValue, float inputError, float inputParameter, float inputParameterError) const {
00068     return (float) (inputError);
00069   };
00070   
00073   float cancelCalibrationError(float outputValue, float outputError, float inputParameter, float inputParameterError) const {
00074     return (float) (outputError);
00075   };        
00076 
00079   bool calibrationValid() const {
00080     return (!std::isnan(getSaturationValue()));
00081   };
00082 
00085   bool keepEvent(float resultValue, float resultError) const {
00086     return true;
00087   };    
00088 
00091   void print (std::ostream& os);
00092   
00095   const std::string getTypeName() const {
00096     return "SaturationConstants";
00097   };   
00098 
00101   const std::string getDataDescription() const {
00102     return "i:CellKey,f:SaturationValue";
00103   };  
00104     
00105 };
00106 
00107 }
